name: Fibonacci
description: A classic DP problem where overlapping subproblems are solved efficiently using memoization or tabulation to compute the nth Fibonacci number.

name: Knapsack
description: Solves the optimization problem of selecting items with given weights and values to maximize value within a weight limit, commonly using a DP table.

name: Longest Common Subsequence
description: Finds the longest subsequence present in two sequences using a DP table to track lengths for all prefixes of the strings.

name: Edit Distance
description: Minimizes the number of insertions, deletions, or substitutions required to convert one string to another using a 2D DP matrix.
